name: unicornfinance
description: Our goal is to create re-usable sample apps that external developer can leverage as reference.

scripts.build: cd client && yarn install  && yarn run build
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently "yarn run dev" "wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && yarn run cy:open" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:ci: concurrently "yarn run dev" "wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && yarn run cy:run" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test: yarn run jest && yarn run test:e2e:ci
